title: Mark's favourite cottage pie
ingredients: ['350g lamb mince', '1 onion, chopped', '1 tin garden peas, drained', '1 tin sliced carrots, drained', '1 tin kidney beans, drained', '1 tin chopped tomatoes', '2 tablespoons tomato puree', '200ml stock', '1 teaspoon mixed herbs', '1 splash Worcestershire sauce', 'salt and pepper to taste', '2 to 3 large potatoes, peeled and chopped', 'milk, as needed', 'butter, to taste', '1/2 teaspoon mustard powder']
